name: Blessed Denial
summary: You exude peace and protection, lessening a harmful condition as it falls upon an ally.
description:
You exude peace and protection, lessening a harmful condition as it falls upon an ally. Reduce the value of the condition your ally would take by 1 (to a minimum of 0). If the ally takes more than one condition at the same time, choose one to reduce.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
trigger: An ally within 30 feet would become frightened, drained, enfeebled, sickened, or stupefied.
